channel.title: Hugging Face Posts
channel.description: This is a website scraping RSS feed for the Hugginface trending posts.

item.title: Christmas came early this year
item.description: Christmas came early this year See translation

item.title: I love getting emails telling me when there's somebody else's active access token in one of my commit SHAs. HF should really only tell you if it is your token, otherwise I could just make a dataset with a bunch of random strings and wait for a valid token.
item.description: I love getting emails telling me when there's somebody else's active access token in one of my commit SHAs. HF should really only tell you if it is your token, otherwise I could just make a dataset with a bunch of random strings and wait for a valid token. permission,token write,hf_. .. finegrained,hf_. .. ... , ... ... Also, don't comment about how unlikely this is. I've gotten a warning email about a token I 'leaked' at least four times. In all cases, it has been in the digest hash. See translation

item.title: The Secret to FREE, Local AI Image Generation is Finally Here
item.description: The Secret to FREE, Local AI Image Generation is Finally Here Tutorial video : https://youtu.be/c3gEoAyL2IE 🎨 Stop struggling with complex AI image generation! In this tutorial, I reveal the ultimate, one-click solution to creating stunning, photorealistic, and stylized AI art LOCALLY on your own computer—for FREE. Tired of confusing workflows, endless command lines, and expensive subscriptions? Forget everything you know about Stable Diffusion and ComfyUI's complexity. I'm introducing you to SwarmUI, the revolutionary tool that leverages the power of ComfyUI's backend with an incredibly simple, user-friendly interface. This isn't just another AI tutorial. This is a complete, all-in-one guide that takes you from ZERO to AI Art PRO in minutes. I provide a one-click installer that sets up everything you need, including pre-configured presets for achieving breathtaking realism and incredible stylization. 🔥 In This Video, You Will Discover: The Easiest AI Art Install Ever: A step-by-...

item.title: Introducing AWQ and GPTQ quantized versions of SmolVLM from Hugging Face!
item.description: Introducing AWQ and GPTQ quantized versions of SmolVLM from Hugging Face! These models only had their text models quantized, and had a 50% model size reduction (4GB~2GB) while keeping model degradation under 1% on the DocVQA benchmark. #huggingface #smolvlm #smollm ronantakizawa/SmolVLM-Instruct-awq ronantakizawa/SmolVLM-Instruct-gptq See translation

item.title: I'm excited to announce the release of Kanon 2 Embedder, the world's best legal
item.description: I'm excited to announce the release of Kanon 2 Embedder, the world's best legal embedding model, ranked first on the Massive Legal Embedding Benchmark 🎉 This model is the product of quite literally months of painstaking work alongside @ abdurrahmanbutler collecting, cleaning, and processing terabytes of data as well as coming up with novel improvements to the standard embedder training recipe to push the limits of what's possible. Kanon 2 Embedder is my most advanced model to date. On MLEB, it benchmarks as 9% more accurate than OpenAI's best embedding model and 30% faster. Even when truncated from 1,792 to 768 dimensions, Kanon 2 Embedder continues to hold the number one spot on MLEB. Importantly, Kanon 2 Embedder is also privacy and security friendly — unlike Voyage, Cohere and Jina, none of your data is used to train our models by default. Kanon 2 Embedder can also be self-hosted for enterprises with heightened security or reliability requirements. You can read the full...

item.title: New drop! 💥 The VLM Object Understanding Comparison Space now runs with Qwen3-VL-4B and moondream3.
item.description: New drop! 💥 The VLM Object Understanding Comparison Space now runs with Qwen3-VL-4B and moondream3. You can compare how models reason about images 🧠 Bonus: thanks to @ ariG23498 , you now get auto-suggested prompts to explore faster. Let’s gooo sergiopaniego/vlm_object_understanding See translation

item.title: 🎉 I am excited to share news of a project my brother, Umar Butler, and I have been working on for what feels like an eternity now.
item.description: 🎉 I am excited to share news of a project my brother, Umar Butler, and I have been working on for what feels like an eternity now. 𝐈𝐧𝐭𝐫𝐨𝐝𝐮𝐜𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐌𝐋𝐄𝐁 — 𝐭𝐡𝐞 𝐌𝐚𝐬𝐬𝐢𝐯𝐞 𝐋𝐞𝐠𝐚𝐥 𝐄𝐦𝐛𝐞𝐝𝐝𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐁𝐞𝐧𝐜𝐡𝐦𝐚𝐫𝐤. A suite of 10 high-quality English legal IR datasets, designed by legal experts to set a new standard for comparing embedding models. Whether you’re exploring legal RAG on your home computer, or running enterprise-scale retrieval, apples-to-apples evaluation is crucial. That’s why we’ve open-sourced everything - including our 7 brand-new, hand-crafted retrieval datasets. All of these datasets are now live on Hugging Face. Any guesses which embedding model leads on legal retrieval? 𝐇𝐢𝐧𝐭: it’s not OpenAI or Google - they place 7th and 9th on our leaderboard. To do well on MLEB, embedding models must demonstrate both extensive legal domain knowledge and strong legal reasoning skills. https://huggingface.co/blog/isaacus/introducing-mleb See translation

item.title: MLEB is the largest, most diverse, and most comprehensive benchmark for legal text embedding models.
item.description: MLEB is the largest, most diverse, and most comprehensive benchmark for legal text embedding models. https://huggingface.co/blog/isaacus/introducing-mleb See translation

item.title: 🌾3LC Cotton Weed Detection Challenge 🌾
item.description: 🌾3LC Cotton Weed Detection Challenge 🌾 We’re excited to announce the launch of the 3LC Cotton Weed Detection Challenge—now live on Kaggle! Build a production-ready weed detector under real-world constraints: small models & imperfect labels—the conditions production AI teams face every day. Your mission • Detect & classify 3 weed species in cotton fields: Carpetweed, Morning Glory, Palmer Amaranth • Train with YOLOv8n @ 640 (fixed model size). Tune augmentation & hyperparameters, but no larger models, ensembles, or stacking allowed • Confront imperfect labels (missed weeds, class confusion, uneven boxes)—exactly what real teams face Prizes (USD $2,000 total) 🥇$1,000 • 🥈 $500• 🥉 $250 • 🎨 $250 Most Creative Solution (shareable across up to 5 teams) Plus: winner & participation certificates, LinkedIn shoutouts, and community recognition. What you’ll learn • Developing AI under strict resource constraints • Data-centric techniques to detect & correct label issues • Designing an iterative...
